item.title: miniTorch
MFont.net
item.description: “Hmm, can Generative AI help us design fonts?” [GitHub Repo] [DOI: 10.1145/3503161.3548414] [Website] MF-Net: A Novel Few-shot Stylized Multilingual Font Generation Method Paper presented at the 30th ACM International Conference on Multimedia (MM â€˜22) Authors: Yufan Zhang, Junkai Man, Peng Sun* Video Presentation Introduction Designing fonts is never a simple task, especially when it comes to non-Latin languages like Chinese, which have intricate glyph patterns and a high number of characters.
